device_system_details.name: Device/System Details
questions: What specific device or system are you having trouble with?
Can you provide the model number or version of the affected hardware/software?
Which browser and version are you using?

timeline.name: Timeline
timeline.description: When did this start, frequency, patterns
examples: Has been intermittent for the past week
questions: When did you first notice this issue?
How often does this problem occur?
Is there a pattern to when this happens?

user_impact.name: User Impact
user_impact.description: How this affects work, urgency, business impact
examples: Blocking entire team from accessing shared files
questions: How is this issue affecting your work?
Are other team members experiencing the same problem?
What business processes are being impacted?

symptoms.name: Symptoms
symptoms.description: Specific error messages, behaviors, what exactly happens
examples: Application freezes for 30 seconds then crashes
questions: What specific error message are you seeing?
Can you describe exactly what happens when the issue occurs?
What do you see on your screen when this problem happens?

context.name: Context
context.description: What user was doing when issue occurred, recent changes
examples: Was uploading a large file when it crashed
Started after office moved to new location
Occurs when opening specific Excel files
questions: What were you doing when this issue first occurred?
Have there been any recent changes to your system or environment?
Does this happen with specific files or applications?

environment.name: Environment
environment.description: User location, department, role (if relevant to issue)
questions: Which office location are you working from?
Are you connected via VPN or in the office?
What department or team are you part of?
